awd_titl_txt: Biotechnology Instrumentation and Laboratory Improvement:   Purchase of an HPLC System for Biotechnology
awd_abstract_narration: This project upgrades the status of the biotechnology laboratory  in order to serve the specific training needs of the  biotechnology private sector.   Students graduating with a degree  in biotechnology from the college are conducting analyses using  the HPLC in the following areas of biotechnology: (1) analysis,  separation, and purification of polypeptides and oligonucleotides  proteins including protein variants; (2) pharmaceutical compounds  such as water soluble vitamins, anticonvulsants, antihistamines,  cateholarnines, antidepressants, and polyaromaic hydrocarbons;  (3) compounds sometimes found in air, water, or other natural  environments that need to be monitored to maintain a healthy  environment; and (4) compounds found in the food industry.
